item.title: Stunning blue pigment on a 13,000-year-old artifact surprises scientists

item.title: This rare bone finally settles the Nanotyrannus mystery
item.description: Scientists have confirmed that Nanotyrannus was a mature species, not a young T. rex. A microscopic look at its hyoid bone provided the key evidence, ...
